Name: Musarat
description: Musarat is , mother of two children, living with her spouse and children in the area of Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She herself owns a nursery farm business for the last eight years, where She sells different kinds of plants. Mostly she focuses on flower plants, fruit plants, and some export quality plants to sell to her customers.she prefers quality instead of quantity from her nursery farming business.She has been feeding her family through the generated income from this nursery farm business. Nowadays, the needs of her family suddenly increased and she does not have other sources to cope with these needs. So she decided to expand her current business.  Therefore, MUSARAT requested a loan from Kivaâ€™s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that she can buy more plants for sale. MUSARAT thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.
